_Xbrl342306dea2584551874eaf2969c102a8.value: MOL Hungarian Oil and Gas Public Limited Company

_Xbrl5533ae36be5945a3a6e1f04157da9073.value:
MOL Plc. and its
  subsidiaries (hereinafter referred to as the Group or MOL Group) is an
  integrated, international oil and gas, petrochemicals and consumer retail
  company, active in over 30 countries with a dynamic international workforce
  of 24,000 people and a track record of more than 100 years in the industry
  with its legal predecessor. MOL Group has over 80 years of experience in exploration and
  production and its diverse portfolio includes active oil and gas presence in
  12 countries, with production activity in 9 countries.
